desc: Medical Care Essentials have over 30 years experience in international sourcing which has allowed us to build a reliable and cost effective supply chain. A PPE supplier for dentists, medics, and the general health care. Able to supply surgical masks such as FFP2, FFP3, nitrile gloves, disposable gowns, surgical gowns.

layout.text: We have kits available for workplaces of all sizes, whether you’re a small business or a large corporation, let us help protect your workplace with quality PPE to suit you.
